version_description:
Search by numbers capabilities are now available in Numbers Generator for Lucky Money and Mega Millions.
As they are in other terminal games in Numbers Generator, you may quickly pick your numbers by shaking your
device, or select your favorite numbers from the picker, then tap the ìSearch itî button to get search results.

Rebranded Cash 3 and Play 4 games to Pick 3 and Pick 4.
Added Pick 2 and Pick 5 games. These are new additions to Florida Lottery games!
Updated Powerball search by numbers to reflect numbers of 1-69 and 1-26.

Added Cash 4 Life game. This is a new addition to Florida Lottery games!
Updated Retailers area, to refresh retailer locations more often.
This release includes bug fixes and improvements, including enhanced error messages.
This release includes updated FLORIDA LOTTO® information to reflect recent enhancements to the Draw game including the addition of the Double Play™ add-on feature.
This release includes bug fixes and improvements, including enhanced error messages.
Games have been updated, old content removed, and usability has been enhanced.
Games have been updated, old content removed, and usability has been enhanced.
